messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: For secretarytocapt3 and MissB
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/2004 1:32:09 AM Eastern Standard Time, secretarytocapt3@.*** writes: I m so happy ^_^ ~IT IS~ Nakajima Nobori s Hijikata!!!!!
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/2004 1:32:09 AM Eastern Standard Time,
secretarytocapt3@... writes:
I'm so happy ^_^
~IT IS~ Nakajima Nobori's Hijikata!!!!!
Phil, I just uploaded an *edited* version of the scanlation + NN's
original work side by side in Photos...so you can delete your version
from Photos.

http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/portraits/rktaethecollector.jpg
Hn. Tae and Kaoru had better enjoy that while they can. They won't have it
for much longer, I assure you! ^_^

-MissBehavin


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: For secretarytocapt3 and MissB
messages.msgSnippet: I m still going through the RK manga scanlation and found something that made me laugh out loud.  If it hadn t been for sec s obsession with a certain artist,
messages.messageBody:
I'm still going through the RK manga scanlation and found something
that made me laugh out loud. If it hadn't been for sec's obsession
with a certain artist, it would've meant little to me beyond the
subject of one of Tae's treasures, which she's offered to give to
Kaoru to cheer her up after Kenshin's departure. MissB, you'll have
to fight either Tae or Kaoru for it. (Tsubame may still have a copy
of the key to Tae's house... )

The last name is misspelled (and probably that word too), but it has
to be the right guy, ne?
http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/vwp?.dir=/&.src=gr&.dnm=rk_ta
e_the_collector.jpg&.view=t&.done=http%
3a//photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/lst%3f%26.dir=/%26.src=gr%
26.view=t

Should the link fail (which always happens to me no matter what I do
to keep it from doing that), it's posted in the Photos section of the
list site (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/shq/ ) as tae_the_collector.

phil
